title: Taliban-led Afghanistan govt serves Kalpataru Projects tax notice of more than Rs 1 crore
description: Kalpataru Projects International Ltd has been served a tax notice by Afghanistan's government for missing declarations for the years 2020-21 and 2021-22. The notice demands AFN 8,952,704 in taxes and fines. Additionally, the company received a GST tax demand in India amounting to Rs 10.50 lakh along with penalties.
